boothgoogle: Google is a proud sponsor of the Holiday Hack Challenge. We wish you a happy holiday hacking season.
rsacbooth: Happy Holidays! Join us April 28 - May 1, 2025 for [RSAC 2025](https://rsaconference.com/events/2025-usa/sans-holiday-hack).
[Click to learn more](https://www.rsaconference.com/usa) about our program.
boothsansedu: Happy holidays from the best college in cybersecurity!
Use code “BestCollege4Hackers” to waive your application fee for any [SANS degree or certificate program](https://www.sans.edu/academics) in 2025.
swagbooth: Swag! Come and get your [Holiday Hack Challenge swag](https://my-store-d53a6c.creator-spring.com/)!
boothmicrosoft: Train Today, Secure Tomorrow with [Microsoft Security Academy](https://microsoft.github.io/PartnerResources/skilling/microsoft-security-academy).
Check out [KC7's Cyber Detective Game](https://kc7cyber.com/), a free cyber game for everyone!
Security is a team sport. Each year, Microsoft empowers our security community by sharing threat trends and insights in our [Digital Defense Report](http://aka.ms/MDDR).
boothamazon: Securing smiles and advancing community this holiday season - _from Amazon_
posterhackspacecon: Happy Holidays from the Hack Space Con team! [www.hackspacecon.com](https://www.hackspacecon.com)
posterpresidentscup: Get ready for some holiday cheer! The future of cyber competitions is loading...
Don’t miss out—register for Presidents Cup 6, starting December 9! Visit: [CISA.gov/presidentscup](https://CISA.gov/presidentscup) to join the fun!
poinsettiamcmittens: Ugh, all this packing up and moving crates is totally messing up my good vibes!
I need a moment to soak up some rays and center myself, if you know what I'm saying?
In the meantime, go see Jingle Ringford. He can help you with some basic island orientation.
Positive thoughts... Need to think positive thoughts... Ooooommm...
angelcandysalt: Hi there and welcome to Frosty's Beach! My name is Angel Candysalt. And before you ask, because everybody does, no... that is not... a euphemism!
I'm in the middle of wrapping things up, but I heard Jingle Ringford wants to speak with you.
Feel free to swing back here once you've finished your Prologue setup.
jingleringford: Welcome to the Geese Islands and the 2023 SANS Holiday Hack Challenge!
I'm Jingle Ringford, one of Santa's many elves.
Just kidding! It's actually the 2024 SANS Holiday Hack Challenge!
And although we're on Frosty's Beach on Christmas Island, we'll soon be on our way back to the North Pole.
I thought it best to wait here for people that heard we're on the Geese Islands but may not know we're leaving.
I haven't seen Santa since we started packing up, but he always asks me to give a quick orientation to newcomers, so I'm continuing the tradition.
Before you head out any further onto the island, you need to accomplish two simple tasks.
But first, here's a parting gift. I packed this snowball made of the magical, never-melting snow of Christmas Island. A little souvenir to take with you when we leave for the North Pole.
Click on the snowball on your avatar. That's where you will see your Objectives, Hints, resource links, and Conversations for the Holiday Hack Challenge.
Now, click on the **Cranberry Pi Terminal** and follow the on-screen instructions.
